name: Crusch & Ferris

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

expansion: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- Vol.2

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

If you do, choose up to 2 "Unseen Hand" in your waiting room, put them on separate positions of your stage, and all of your "Unseen Hand" get +1 soul and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal 2 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

expansion: Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- Vol.2
